docs.title: Privacy
docs.text:
Last updated: August 5, 2025

This website, Elims Documentation, provides a static site generated using MkDocs and Material for MkDocs. GitHub Pages hosts and publishes the site.

This page outlines the minimal data practices of this site and respects your privacy.

docs.title: No Personal Data Collected
docs.text:
This site doesn't collect, store, or process any personal data.

  • No contact forms
  • No user accounts
  • No login or registration
  • No tracking cookies or third-party analytics

docs.title: No Cookies
docs.text: This site doesn't use any cookies, not for analytics, personalization, or advertising.

docs.title: No Embedded Trackers
docs.text:
This site doesn't embed or include any scripts from third-party services that track visitors (for example, Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, etc.).

All JavaScript used on this site stays self-hosted and improves the documentation experience (for example, rendering diagrams and charts via Mermaid and Plotly).

docs.title: Hosting and Logs
docs.text:
GitHub Pages hosts this site, a static site hosting service provided by GitHub. GitHub may collect standard web server logs (for example, IP addresses, browser type, referring pages) for operational and security purposes.

Please consult GitHub’s Privacy Statement for more details on how GitHub handles such data.

docs.title: External Links
docs.text: This documentation may include links to third-party websites (for example, GitHub repositories, hardware data sheets). The site owners bear no responsibility for the privacy policies or practices of those external sites.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or the site’s behavior, you may reach out via GitHub.

docs.title: Changes to This Policy
docs.text: This privacy policy may need updates to reflect changes in site features or hosting. The site owners will document any updates on this page, with the "last updated" date at the top revised accordingly.
